question: Benjamin Netanyahu, who was making news recently, was the Prime Minister of which country?
explanation:
After the coalition of the Prime Minister of Israel Benjamin Netanyahu failed to pass a budget, the Parliament of the country dissolved.
This has triggered a fourth election in two years in the country, likely on March 23, next year. As per the three-year coalition deal, Netanyahu serves as Premier for 18 months, and Benny Gantz, the Alternate Prime Minister, was to take over in November 2021.
